River Queen attempts to pack a complicated, sweeping, historical narrative into just under two hours. There are some breathtaking battle scenes and the Wanganui scenery is beautiful, well suited to 19th Century filmmaking.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to My Life as a Zucchini.
My Life as a Zucchini is a movie with beautiful drawings by a pretty traditional plot. Brother's relationship between human and animals are foreseen enough. No surprise, the story could be found in many classic books. What is beautiful in this film

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is the first of three AVCO did-together, has just as many martial arts sequences and an enjoyable one and a half hour watch. It is a basic revenge tale and it is acted well, but the film is quite generic and devoid of anything worthwhile to say, visually creative,
